    (poly_of_interest p n).vars =

          (witt_mul p (n + 1) + p ^ (n + 1) * X (0, n + 1) * X (1, n + 1) -
              X (0, n + 1) * rename (prod.mk (1 : fin 2)) (witt_polynomial p â„¤ (n + 1)) -
            X (1, n + 1) * rename (prod.mk (0 : fin 2)) (witt_polynomial p â„¤ (n + 1)))).vars :=
  by
  have : (p ^ (n + 1) : mv_polynomial (fin 2 Ã— â„•) â„¤) = C (p ^ (n + 1) : â„¤) := by
    simp only [Int.cast_ofNat, eq_intCast, C_pow, eq_self_iff_true]
  rw [poly_of_interest, this, vars_C_mul]
  apply pow_ne_zero
  exact_mod_cast hp.out.ne_zero

theorem nth_remainder_spec (n : â„•) (x y : (exprğ•) k) :

theorem mul_poly_of_interest_aux3 (n : â„•) :
    witt_poly_prod p (n + 1) =
      -(p ^ (n + 1) * X (0, n + 1)) * (p ^ (n + 1) * X (1, n + 1)) +

        remainder p n :=

    simp only [Int.cast_ofNat, eq_intCast, C_pow, eq_self_iff_true]
